Text:
Just a heads up.
This is not the original Cantonese version, it's in Mandarin.
The subtitles are terrible on this, they lag pretty badly.

Thx 4 this, I lost my DVD.
I'm after Tony Wong in The Untold Story 2, anybody outthere got it??
@Bubble4: Dude, Mandarin is Chinese. It's one of the different types of Chinese.
@darklemming: Obviously Mandarin is "Chinese," but it's not the original language of the film; it's been dubbed.

it's like a movie's in Spanish and it got dubbed over in Portuguese. Close...but no.

For all of you who don't want this dubbed crap - the full trilogy in original Cantonese 5.1 with English soft subs: http://www.asiatorrents.com/index.php?page=torrent-details&id=52bee6134852e0317e440b099eb9e197b4c512f1
